system.requirements: Non Sororitas or Tech-Priest Career, DH Rank 5+. Have been singled out by the Tyrantine Cabal, to take this path means becoming part of their secret orders and goals.
system.descriptionText: A Secret order that act to maintain an ignorance regarding a wandering celestial object known as the Tyrant Star, this black star brings madness and death, to the Tyrantine it is a source of concern, to be hidden from outsiders and to be studied by those in the know.
system.effects:
Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the 
Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talent Labyrinth Conditioning
